intro: Xanthophytum ferrugineum, commonly known as the rusty xanthophytum, is a flowering plant native to South America, particularly Argentina and Chile. Xanthophytum ferrugineum is often found in dry, rocky habitats and is adapted to thrive in arid conditions.
